survey_brief: This survey aims to understand consumer attitudes, preferences, and barriers related to electric vehicle (EV) adoption to inform market strategies.

questions.question_text: How likely are you to consider purchasing an electric vehicle (EV) as your next car?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for clarity. Ensure mobile-friendly radio button layout.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: SINGLE_CHOICE (radio buttons). Randomize option order to minimize bias.

script.question_text: How likely are you to consider purchasing an electric vehicle (EV) as your next car?

questions.question_text: What factors are most important to you when considering an EV? (Select up to 3)
questions.client_notes: Multi-select with a cap of 3 options. Include 'Other' with open-field if needed.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: MULTI_CHOICE (checkboxes) with max selections enforced.

script.question_text: What factors are most important to you when considering an EV? (Select up to 3)

questions.question_text: What is your biggest concern about owning an EV?
questions.client_notes: Include an optional open-text field for 'Other' responses.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: SINGLE_CHOICE with optional open-text follow-up.

script.question_text: What is your biggest concern about owning an EV?

questions.question_text: How often do you take road trips exceeding 200 miles one-way?
questions.client_notes: Helps assess range anxiety relevance. Ensure clear mile/km clarification if needed.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: SINGLE_CHOICE with tooltip for mileage conversion.

script.question_text: How often do you take road trips exceeding 200 miles one-way?

questions.question_text: Which of the following charging options would be most convenient for you?
questions.client_notes: Single-choice with an option for non-adopters.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: SINGLE_CHOICE with 'Not applicable' as final option.

script.question_text: Which of the following charging options would be most convenient for you?

questions.question_text: What is your household income range?
questions.client_notes: Standard income brackets with opt-out. Randomize order to reduce bias.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: SINGLE_CHOICE with randomized options (except 'Prefer not to say').

script.question_text: What is your household income range?

questions.question_text: Which EV brands are you most familiar with? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Multi-select with 'Other' open-field. Track unaided brand awareness.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: MULTI_CHOICE with optional open-text for 'Other'.

script.question_text: Which EV brands are you most familiar with? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How much of a premium would you be willing to pay for an EV compared to a similar gasoline vehicle?
answer_options: None – must be same price or cheaper
questions.routing_logic: Respondents who selected 'Very likely' or 'Somewhat likely' in Q1
questions.client_notes: Critical for pricing strategy. Ensure percentage ranges are unambiguous.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: SINGLE_CHOICE. Hide from unlikely adopters (Q1 responses).

script.question_text: How much of a premium would you be willing to pay for an EV compared to a similar gasoline vehicle?
answer_options: None – must be same price or cheaper
script.routing_logic: Respondents who selected 'Very likely' or 'Somewhat likely' in Q1

questions.question_text: What additional features would incentivize you to choose an EV? (Open-ended)
questions.routing_logic: Respondents who selected 'Neutral', 'Somewhat unlikely', or 'Very unlikely' in Q1
questions.client_notes: Qualitative insights for overcoming adoption barriers. Limit to 200 characters.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: OPEN_TEXT with character counter.

script.question_text: What additional features would incentivize you to choose an EV? (Open-ended)
script.routing_logic: Respondents who selected 'Neutral', 'Somewhat unlikely', or 'Very unlikely' in Q1

questions.question_text: How do you primarily commute to work/school?
questions.client_notes: Baseline for current transportation habits. Include hybrid/EV distinction.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: SINGLE_CHOICE with 'Other' option if needed.

script.question_text: How do you primarily commute to work/school?
